CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 7, 1945, pg. 22, reads: "Happy Time - A party in honor of houseguests was given by Mr. and Mrs. Lloyd Adams, of 2437 Webster Avenue. Guests are shown, seated, left to right: Elizabeth Ethridge, Stella Ethridge, Mr. and Mrs. Clarence D. Adams, Thelma and Lloyd Adams Jr., Mr. and Mrs. James Nichols, Elizabeth Adams, A. Moncrief, Clarence Adams Jr., Mrs. Jessie Simpson, Mrs. Ann McAdams, Baby Marlene, Mrs. Williams and Lloyd W. Adams. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Guests Elizabeth Ethridge, Stella Ethridge, Clarence D. Adams, Mrs. Adams, Thelma Adams, Lloyd Adams Jr., Mrs. Nichols, James Nichols, Elizabeth Adams, A. Moncrief, Clarence Adams Jr., Jessie Simpson, Ann McAdams, baby Marlene, Mrs. Williams and Lloyd W. Adams gathered for party in Adams home, 2437 Webster Avenue, Hill District
